pageContext.description: Much used. Butt blunted or hammered on one side, broken on the other. high stop ridge. Thick midrib. Edge blunt, slightly expanded, low curve.
pageContext.patina: Dark green and brown patina. Fairly lustrous; glassy green in septum on one face. Dull grey-green matter adheres to the other within the hollow.
pageContext.surface: Pitted. Some gold metal visible on edge and ridge.
pageContext.other: Width: edge 53mm; ridge 26mm; below butt 28mm,Thickness: at ridge 28mm,Weight: 13 3/8 oz = 379.17487
pageContext.collection: Dr. H. E. Walker (inherited from his father),Plas-yn-Dref, Corwen, N. Wales,)Drawn L.F.C., July 1927)
pageContext.site: wales,?merionethshire,?parish of corwen,found on the bemoyns, exact site and history unknown.
